modernUI.content: This interface uses modern design patterns with responsive layouts, dark/light mode support, and accessible components from shadcn/ui.

performance.title: ‚ö° Performance
performance.content: Fast development and build times with modern tooling. The application is optimized for performance and developer experience.

readyToBuild.content: The foundation is set up with routing, authentication, and a clean layout. You can now add your custom features and components.

profile.activeSessionsDesc: These are the devices and browsers where you're currently signed in

auth.secureAuth: Secure authentication powered by Clerk for seamless user experience.

theme.themeDescription: Adjust the appearance and layout to suit your preferences.
